title: World pays tribute to Prince - BBC News
summary: singer prince has died at age 57 at his home in minnesota .
top hits include when doves cry , kiss and purple rain .
fans are gathering outside his estate .
he had recently been in hospital for the flu .

documents.title: end of live coverage
text: that 's the end of our live coverage after the death of prince .
elsewhere on the bbc , you can read his obituary , see a round-up of photographs from his life and work , or read fans ' tributes .
you can also listen to a half-hour programme of world have your say , where musicians and fans from around the world remember his work .

documents.title: virtuoso , untouchable
text: the singer annie lennox , who became internationally famous in the 1980s - also prince 's era - has said on facebook that he was `` untouchable '' .

documents.title: prince : 'i 'm no different to anyone '
text: the music magazine nme has put together some of prince 's words from an interview he did with them in 1996 .
i 'm no different to anyone .
yes , i have fame and wealth and talent , but i certainly do n't consider myself any better than anyone who has no fame , wealth or talent .
people fascinate me .
they 're amazing !
life fascinates me !
and i 'm no more fascinated by my own life than by anyone else 's .

documents.title: prince fan site down
text: a prince fan site has been so overwhelmed with traffic it has crashed .
prince.org was replaced with a message praising the star 's `` unique ability to touch people '' .

documents.title: prince around the clock
text: a radio station in prince 's hometown of minneapolis is playing his music non-stop today .
you can stream it online here .

documents.title: little purple prince
text: social media users are sharing this cartoon of prince in his purple rain era , reimagined as the little prince from the classic antoine de saint-exupery children 's book .
the cartoon appeared on tumblr four years ago .

documents.title: 2016 celebrity deaths
text: harper lee , alan rickman , david bowie , victoria wood , now prince - have more famous people died so far this year than usual ?
radio 4 's more or less team took a look at the idea .
there was a surge in people getting famous fifty or sixty years ago - does that explain the wave of celebrity deaths in 2016 ?
you can listen to the programme here .

documents.title: mick jagger tweets : prince 's talent was limitless
text: the rolling stones star wrote :
mick jagger
mickjagger
i am deeply shocked to hear of prince 's passing .
mick jagger
mickjagger
prince was a revolutionary artist , a great musician , composer , a wonderful lyricist , a startling guitar player 2/4
mick jagger
mickjagger
but most importantly , authentic in every way .
mick jagger
mickjagger
prince 's talent was limitless .
he was one of the most unique and talented artists of the last 30 years 4/4

documents.title: 'king amongst musicians '
text: it 's heartbreaking news .
everyone is truly shocked .
bowie , now this .
the two most talented adventurous creative talents of their respective generations .
a genius in the world of funk and soul .
a trendsetter and a tastemaker .
an electric performer with an insatiable appetite for music .
he might have been named prince but he was a king amongst musicians .

documents.title: worldwide musicians and fans pay tribute
text: in a special edition of the bbc world service programme world have your say , musicians and fans from around the world spoke to chloe tilly about why prince was so influential and why they loved him .
listen here .

documents.title: president obama : prince did it all
text: today , the world lost a creative icon .
michelle and i join millions of fans from around the world in mourning the sudden death of prince .
few artists have influenced the sound and trajectory of popular music more distinctly , or touched quite so many people with their talent .
as one of the most gifted and prolific musicians of our time , prince did it all .
funk .
r & b .
rock and roll .
he was a virtuoso instrumentalist , a brilliant bandleader , and an electrifying performer .
'a strong spirit transcends rules , ' prince once said - and nobody 's spirit was stronger , bolder , or more creative .
our thoughts and prayers are with his family , his band , and all who loved him.‎

documents.title: hometown tributes
text: `` prince was un-apologetically different and he made it okay for his fans to be different and to celebrate their individuality , '' the mayor of minneapolis , betsy hodges , has written .
`` his social conscience challenged us to look deeper than the skin color of our neighbors . ''
the minnesota timberwolves basketball team tweeted in honour of prince as well .
for minneapolis , the loss of prince is too large to describe .
certainly in 140 characters .
please read : # princerip
@ twitterid we 'd certainly love your signature on our petition to honor prince 's memory
@ twitterid for those of us who lived in msp even for a short time , his impact was known .
a great city that always embraced individuality .

documents.title: style icons : prince and david bowie
text: lee trewhela , cornish entertainment journalist , writing in the west briton makes the connect between the two music legends .
like bowie , prince made people question sexuality .
like bowie , he had an innate sense of style .

and while bowie brought the funk to white man 's music , prince was clever enough to cross over unlike any other black artist of the time - even jacko - by integrating rock guitar into soul , knocking down racial stereotypes in the process . ''

documents.title: 'an original who influenced so many '
text: today , we remember and celebrate him as one of the most uniquely gifted artists of all time .
never one to conform , he redefined and forever changed our musical landscape .
prince was an original who influenced so many , and his legacy will live on forever .
we have lost a true innovator and our sincerest condolences go out to his family , friends , collaborators , and all who have been impacted by his incredible work .

documents.title: 'greatest guitar plays of our time '
text: travis barker , the drummer of us rock band blink-182 hailed prince as `` a musical genius '' .
rest in peace to one of my favorite artists of all time .
have n't loved an artist as long or as consistently as i have prince .
my dream was to one day collaborate with him or play drums for him .
he use to come watch # djam and i play .
those nights went down as some of my favourite .
i taught my kids about him from a very young age and has always stayed a favorite in our family , we even got to see him play a couple times together .
sad day , we lost one of the funkiest and most inspiring artists of our time .
one of the greatest guitars players of our time .
to me he was truly a musical genius , a true original .

documents.title: statement from prince 's management
text: a spokeswoman for the singer has told the bbc :
it is with profound sadness that i am confirming that the legendary , iconic performer , prince rogers nelson , has died at his paisley park residence this morning at the age of 57 .
there are no further details as to the cause of death at this time .

documents.title: a celebrated singer and producer

# prince was not only a talented musician , but an actor , producer , & director .

documents.title: gene simmons pays tribute
text: kiss frontman gene simmons was speaking to the bbc when he heard the news of prince 's death .
he said :
prince , glen frey david bowie , these are people who changed lives .
these are not just songs they are the soundtrack of people 's lives , you remember things in your lives .
in the days when i went out with diana ross and he was still singing in his underwear on stage , i took diana to see him at a club and i said 'you 've got to check this guy out ' .
he was singing in a pure falsetto but his talent was undeniable .
it was like 'oh oh , look at this guy ' .
what he 's done is undeniable - he carved his own road and whether the record company liked him or not he was his own guy - his body of work is undeniable .
